title: Remove authentication requirements from login and import functionality

requirements.summary: Remove authentication check from PartyFormDialog when generating new party IDs, allowing unauthenticated users to create parties
acceptanceCriteria: PartyFormDialog allows party creation without authentication
Party ID generation works for unauthenticated users
No authentication errors appear when creating parties

file_operations.description: Remove the authentication check that prevents unauthenticated users from generating party IDs. Modify the handleSubmit function to allow party creation without requiring the user to be authenticated. Update any conditional logic that gates party ID generation behind authentication state. Ensure the form submission flow works for both authenticated and unauthenticated users while preserving validation logic for party data fields (name, address, phone, PAN, due amount).

requirements.summary: Remove authentication check from ExcelPartyImportCard, allowing unauthenticated users to import parties from Excel/CSV files
acceptanceCriteria: Batch party imports succeed for unauthenticated users
No authentication errors during file import process

file_operations.description: Remove authentication requirement checks that prevent unauthenticated users from importing parties via Excel/CSV files. Update the file upload and batch processing flow to work without checking authentication state. Ensure the import functionality (file parsing, party ID validation, and batch party creation) works for all users while maintaining data validation, progress tracking, and error handling logic.

requirements.summary: Remove authentication check from JsonTransferCard import functionality, allowing unauthenticated users to import JSON data
acceptanceCriteria: JSON data import works without authentication
Both merge and overwrite modes function for unauthenticated users
No authentication errors during JSON import

file_operations.description: Remove authentication requirement checks that prevent unauthenticated users from importing JSON data. Update the import functionality to allow both merge and overwrite modes for all users. Ensure the JSON file parsing, data validation, and import operations (including cache invalidation) work without requiring authentication while preserving the data transfer logic and error handling.
